headline: E-Commerce Heat-Resistant Packaging Market Forecast and Competitive Strategy Report 2025-2033: Amcor, Novolex, DS Smith and Nordic Cold Chain Lead Innovations
summary: The e-commerce heat-resistant packaging market offers opportunities in expanding temperature-sensitive deliveries for food, pharmaceuticals, and cosmetics driven by rising online sales.
